title: FREE HEAT in Ravenswood! Modern w/fitness room, laundry, more
posting_body: RAVENSWOOD – 5076 N Wolcott, 1st floor - Wolcott and Winona - corner condo unit, 2BR/1BA located on a tree-lined residential street - Spacious!

Features modern eat-in kitchen with stainless steel appliances (refrigerator, stove, dishwasher, microwave), queen-sized bedrooms, walk-in closet, hardwood floors throughout, deck, coin-operated laundry onsite, heat, fitness room, and storage locker included, and near plenty of greenspace, public transportation (Brown line, Foster, Lawrence, Montrose, Ashland bus routes), plus several restaurants, shops, and cafes!

The accuracy of all information, regardless of source, including but not limited to square footage and lot sizes, is deemed reliable but not guaranteed and should be personally verified through personal inspection by an/or with the appropriate professionals.
Video showing by link located here!
STRONG applications needed for consideration including great credit!!!
$65 credit/background check per person 18+, $350 non-refundable move-in fee per person (no security deposit), $250 refundable HOA move-in fee, and first month‘s rent due at lease signing.
Tenants pay electricity and cooking gas.
Available August 1st – requires 24 hour notice to show.
Lori Dake, an IL Licensed Broker
